card.name: Amatar Temple
card.text: A player losing unspent mana causes that player to lose that much life.

card.name: An-Drim Coast
card.text: When you planeswalk to An-Drim Coast or at the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target permanent that's red, white, or blue.

card.name: Boánn, River of Wisdom
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, scry X, where X is that creature's power, then draw a card.

card.name: The Circle of Sloth
card.text: Whenever you planeswalk to The Circle of Sloth, put a stun counter on each artifact and each creature.

card.name: The Circle of Wrath
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may have it get +X/+0, where X is its power. If you do, exile it at end of combat.

card.name: City of Gevangis
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a color. Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to that color.

card.name: Cryptic Canyon
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only to roll the planar die.

card.name: Damnation's Gate
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell during a turn other than their own, that player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

card.name: Deribad, Drownside Capital
card.text: Artifacts you control have "{1}, {T}: You get {E} (an energy counter)." and "{E}{E}{E}: Create a token that's a copy of this artifact."

card.name: Desert of Ashur
card.text: Whenever a player would gain life for the first time each turn, instead that player loses that much life.

card.name: Dutch's Homestead
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an X/X Illusion creature token with decayed, where X is that spell's mana value. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: The Dying Ice
card.text: Creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them for each {C} spent to cast them.

card.name: Fort Charles
card.text: Whenever you spend mana to roll the planar die, you may distribute that many +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Ghallil Sea
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Glintbone Reach
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, for each color among creatures you control, add one mana of that color.

card.name: Grafting Chambers
card.text: Creature cards in your hand have emerge. Their emerge cost is equal to {3} plus their mana cost.

card.name: High Tara
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may tap two untapped creatures you control. If you do, scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Lórgan Town
card.text: Creatures without flying or that aren't vehicles can't attack you.

card.name: Mount Dreadnight
card.text: All permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types.

card.name: The Nightpit
card.text: All creatures have "Pay 2 life: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Pundar's Sanctum
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. If you do, destroy target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of creatures tapped this way.

card.name: Ren's Galleries
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, manifest target creature card from a graveyard. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

card.name: Ruins of Blackwater
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you get {E} (an energy counter). Then you may pay {E}{E}{E}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: The Skysea
card.text: Creatures with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with reach. Creatures with reach can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

card.name: Sotak's Temple
card.text: As long as you control seven or more nonland permanents, if you would draw a card, instead scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Soul of Quartz
card.text: Lands and creatures are artifacts in addition to their other types.

card.name: The Weepwood
card.text: All Human creatures have base power and toughness 3/2 and are Mutants in addition to their other types.
